Brita GmbH bụ ụlọ ọrụ Germany nke naemepụta nzacha mmiri.
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Taunusstein nso Wiesbaden na Hesse, Germany
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe dị na China, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, na United Kingdom
A naekesa ngwaahịa Brita na mba 69.
Brita naemepụta ite mmiri (BPA-free, nke e ji styrene methyl methacrylate copolymer mee), kettles na tap attachments na integrated disposable filters
Usoro nzacha ha bụ carbon na-arụ ọrụ na resin mgbanwe ion
A na-emepụta carbon naarụ ọrụ site na mkpokoro akị bekee. Dị ka Brita si kwuo, nzacha ahụ nwere mmetụta abụọ:
Na United Kingdom, Hinari na Breville naere kettles eletrik naetinye teknụzụ Brita.
Aha mbụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ AquaDeMat tupu o mechara gụọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ aha nwa ya nwanyị. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara ikike mbụ maka iji nzacha mmiri nụlọ na 1970s.

Nafọ 1988, ụlọ ọrụ Clorox, nke dị na Oakland, California, banyere na nkwekọrịta ikikere na nkesa na ụlọ ọrụ Germany maka North na South America. Nafọ 1995, ọ gbakwunyere ikike ndị Canada site ninweta Brita International Holdings nke Canada

Nafọ 2000, Clorox nwetara naanị ikike nke akara ahụ na Amerịka ma Brita kwetara na nkwekọrịta naabụghị asọmpi ruo n'afọ 2005. Nafọ 2008, Brita laghachiri nahịa North America nokpuru akara Mavea, naanị ịpụ ọzọ na 2016
[isi iyi   Otú ọ dị, a ka naere ngwaahịa na US nokpuru aha Brita.
